* PrimeBanner

PrimeBanner is a banner generator. The results are banner where the number values are prime.

** Examples

*** trumae

#+BEGIN_SRC 
./primebanner -text trumae
#+END_SRC

**** Ouput 
#+BEGIN_SRC
* BANNER

111111111111111111111111110111111111111111111111111111111111111111
111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111

111118811111188881111111881118811118811188111188111881111881111111

111118811111188111881111888888811118811188111188111881111888888811
111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111
111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111

* NUMBER



The probability of the chosen number being prime is 0.999755859375
#+END_SRC


*** galo

#+BEGIN_SRC 
./primebanner -text galo
#+END_SRC
